trans-unit.source: Represents the metrics used to lay out a character in a device font.
trans-unit.target: Representa a métrica usada para criar o layout de um caractere em uma fonte de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> object is constructed using the default metric values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>objeto é construído usando os valores de métricas padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> class by specifying the metrics as a string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> classe especificando as métricas como uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The `metrics` parameter is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: O `metrics` parâmetro é uma cadeia de caracteres delimitada por vírgulas que especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>Propriedades na seguinte ordem:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>as primeiras duas propriedades, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, são necessárias.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, cinco propriedades são opcionais e o padrão serão zero se não for especificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "0.75,0.75,,0.1" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você especificar o valor de cadeia de caracteres de "0.75,0.75,,0.1" para o `metrics` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>propriedades são definidas, as propriedades não especificadas são definidas como zero.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited <xref:System.String> value that represents the metrics for the character.
trans-unit.target: Um separado por vírgulas <xref:System.String>valor que representa a métrica para o caractere.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the baseline value for the character.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de linha de base para o caractere.

trans-unit.source: The return value represents the vertical offset from the bottom of the black box to the baseline.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno representa o deslocamento vertical da parte inferior da caixa preta na linha de base.

trans-unit.source: A positive value indicates the baseline is above the bottom of the black box, while a negative value indicates the baseline is below the bottom of the black box.
trans-unit.target: Um valor positivo indica que a linha de base está acima da parte inferior da caixa preta, enquanto um valor negativo indica que a linha de base está abaixo da parte inferior da caixa preta.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the baseline.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:System.Double>que representa a linha de base.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura da caixa preta do caractere.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box height.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:System.Double>que representa a altura da caixa preta.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the black box for the character.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a largura da caixa preta do caractere.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> representing the black box width.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:System.Double>que representa a largura da caixa preta.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space below the black box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaço em branco recomendado abaixo da caixa preta.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: Um valor negativo indica uma projeção.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and BottomSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: O avanço vertical para o caractere é a soma dos valores de propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>e BottomSideBearing.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O avanço vertical não pode ser menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objeto é igual ao atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>objetos são iguais se as propriedades a seguir são iguais: <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A><xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objeto a ser comparado ao atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os objetos forem iguais; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash code from the metric values of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um código hash dos valores da métricos de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the left of the black box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o recomendado espaço em branco à esquerda da caixa preta.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: Um valor negativo indica uma projeção.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values LeftSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O avanço horizontal para o caractere é a soma dos valores de propriedade LeftSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O avanço horizontal não pode ser menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a comma-delimited string representing metric values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres delimitada por vírgulas que representa os valores da métrica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>valor é uma cadeia de caracteres delimitada por vírgulas que especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics>Propriedades na seguinte ordem:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>as primeiras duas propriedades, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, são necessárias.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.Baseline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, cinco propriedades são opcionais e o padrão serão zero se não for especificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você especificar o valor de cadeia de caracteres de "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`" para o `metrics` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>propriedades são definidas, as propriedades não especificadas são definidas como zero.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the right of the black box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o recomendado espaço em branco à direita da caixa preta.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: Um valor negativo indica uma projeção.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and RightSideBearing.
trans-unit.target: O avanço horizontal para o caractere é a soma dos valores de propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>e RightSideBearing.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O avanço horizontal não pode ser menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaço em branco recomendado acima da caixa preta.

trans-unit.source: Recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: Espaço em branco acima da caixa preta recomendado.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values TopSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O avanço vertical para o caractere é a soma dos valores de propriedade TopSideBearing, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O avanço vertical não pode ser menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor do tipo <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>
